document.full_text: casey anthony lived a life full of deception and elaborate lies that culminated in the murder of her own daughter, prosecutors alleged on tuesday, but defense lawyers said the girl drowned in a swimming pool.
document.title: casey anthony lied and killed daughter: prosecutor
lines_and_colors: casey anthony lived a life full of deception and elaborate lies that culminated in the murder of her own daughter, prosecutors alleged on tuesday, but defense lawyers said the girl drowned in a swimming pool.
